numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that younger people think that the world is getting better.
2. I notice that older people do not think that the world is getting better.
3. I wonder why there is no information about ages from 25 to 39.
4. I wonder why young people believe that Indonesia is getting better.
5. I wonder why old people believe that Indonesia is getting better.
7. Everyone that I surround myself with believes that the world is getting better.
8. Not everyone believes that the world is getting better.
9. The title is: Old to Young.
